state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, insert the American style passkey into the American style portal in the salon's lock to unlock it. And then, assure that the American style portal is ajar. After that, try to venture south. And then, ensure that the gateway is open. And then, make an attempt to head east. After that, attempt to head south. And then, make an attempt to travel west. Following that, pick up the keycard from the floor of the bathroom. After getting the keycard, make an attempt to take a trip west. That done, take a trip west. And then, check that the passageway is unlocked with the keycard. And then, ensure that the passageway is open. Then, take a trip west. Next, pick-up the huckleberry from the floor of the spare room. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Salon =- You're now in the salon. There is a closed American style portal leading south. There is an open gate leading west. > -= Salon =-0/1
admissible_commands: unlock American style portal with American style passkey
optimal_action: unlock American style portal with American style passkey

state: You unlock American style portal. > -= Salon =-0/2
admissible_commands: lock American style portal with American style passkey

state: You open American style portal. > -= Salon =-0/3

-= Garage =- You arrive in a garage. A typical kind of place. There is a closed gateway leading east. There is an open American style portal leading north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Garage =-0/4

-= Office =- You've just sauntered into an office. You begin to take stock of what's here. If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a table. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The table is standard. However, the table, like an empty table, has nothing on it. There is an open gateway leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. > -= Office =-0/6
admissible_commands: put American style passkey on table

state: -= Chamber =- You've just shown up in a chamber. You see a safe. You see a desk. The desk is standard. However, the desk, like an empty desk, has nothing on it. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Chamber =-0/7
admissible_commands: put American style passkey on desk

state: -= Bathroom =- You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a bathroom. You can make out a locked basket. Look over there! a board. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a board, go to TextWorld. The board is standard. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. There is a keycard on the floor. > -= Bathroom =-0/8
admissible_commands: put American style passkey on board

state: You pick up the keycard from the ground. > -= Bathroom =-0/9
admissible_commands: put American style passkey on board

state: -= Workshop =- You find yourself in a workshop. There is an open portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Workshop =-0/10

-= Launderette =- You are in a launderette. A standard one. What's that over there? It looks like it's a cabinet. There is a closed passageway leading west. There is an open portal leading east. > -= Launderette =-0/11

-= Spare Room =- You've entered a spare room. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a stand. However, the stand, like an empty stand, has nothing on it. There is an open passageway leading east. There is an open hatch leading south. There is a huckleberry on the floor. > -= Spare Room =-0/14
admissible_commands: put American style passkey on stand
